articles.title: Charlotte leaders criticized over killing of Ukrainian woman as Trump, MAGA target another Dem city
articles.description:
Critics say the death of Iryna Zarutska, 23, could have been prevented, and they're blaming officials for failing to keep a man with a history of mental illness, arrests and erratic behavior off the streets before he killed her.

The post Charlotte leaders criticized over killing of Ukrainian woman as Trump, MAGA target another Dem city appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Iryna Zarutska, 23, was killed by a man with a history of mental illness.
Critics blame Charlotte officials for failing to prevent the tragedy.
Local residents express concern over public safety and mental health policies.
